# 윤석열 “군인 통닭 사줄 돈 딱딱 깎길래 계엄”…또 예산삭감 탓 - 한겨레

[원문 링크](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMickFVX3lxTFA4NXNaZVh6MXlMdUU2U1p0d19rSTNnczVJakkwRW5wVHZRbFV6TmlOT1k3WnByNXpSZFhwR2toTTByWVdLbGpTaC1tSXJ3NjhZOEoybzhTR0dvSFJtMEROVVd6aS1pVk1sVjFrdkVZVEVqUQ?oc=5)
